Hey there

We use cookies to provide, protect, and promote our products.
We may use the terms "cookies" to refer to all technologies that we may use to store data in your browser or device or that collect information or help us identify you in the manner described above, such as web beacons or "pixel tags".
We use both first- and third-party cookies.
We use cookies and similar technologies for a number of reasons, as specified below.
We use cookies and similar technologies for a number of reasons, including to help personalize your experience and to personalize the ads we serve you.

In order to register an account to use our Service, you will be required to register and provide us with the following Personal Data: your full name and your email address.
When you sign up for newsletters or request to join our beta program, we collect your name and email address.

We and/or our service providers use analytics tools, including "Google Analytics" to collect and analyze information about the use of the Site and/or Service, such as how often users visit the Site, what pages they visit when they do so, and what other sites and mobile applications they used prior to visiting the Site.

In addition, we may receive information about you from third-party tools, such as your position, seniority, department, company name, company size, and industry.
This Privacy Notice also explains how we process, transfer, store and disclose the information collected, as well as your ability to control certain uses of the collected information.
